2. Which of these is not true about static methods?

answers.a: a.It cannot access non static data.
answers.b: b.It belongs to the object and not the class.
answers.c: c.It can be accessed directly by the class name and doesnâ€™t need any object.
answers.d: d.Can call only other static methods and cannot call a non-static method from it.

questions.question: 3.Identify the access rules of      i. static methods accessing non static methods.        ii. non static methods accessing static methods.

answers.a: a.static methods can access non-static method only through objects.
answers.b: b.non-static methods can access static methods directly or through the class.
answers.c: c.static methods can access non-static method using this keyword.
answers.d: d.non-static methods can access static methods using static keyword.
